ovdesc.p: Stock Exchange Calendar is a calendar in which a Settlement day is defined for a Stock Exchange & year, and for a period.

desc.p: Ending Date of the period for which a settlement date is being defined. Validation is done to match the "YEAR" of ID and TO.DATE
A check is done to make sure that TO.DATE is greater than or equal to FROM.DATE
Starting Date of the period for which a settlement date is being defined. Validation is done to match the "YEAR" of ID and FROM.DATE
If multiple Settlement days are defined, a check is made to make sure that FROM.DATE is greater than or equal to the last settlement date.
If an existing calendar is being modified, a check is made to make sure that FROM.DATE is not greater than TO.DATE

ID of Stock Exchange Calendar consists of Two (2) parts. (1) - Stock Exchange Code - 3 digit code of the Stock Exchange for which the calendar is being defined. This code is validated in Stock Exchange file. (2) - Year - Calendar year. Year should be in the range of 1950 - 2049.
Settlement Date for the period defined.
SETTLEMENT.DATE should be greater than or equal to TO.DATE. Also this date should be a working day for the Stock Exchange. If not, next working day is displayed for information.
